sentence.Network_en: Several years later, will these splendent architecture and culture still exist along the Niger River?
sentence.Network_cn: 若干年后, 这些辉煌的建筑和文化是否还会在尼日尔河畔留存?

sentence.Network_en: It's been a long time since Chinese Animation industry commenced , which has created a splendent achievement.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国动画起步很早,也取得过辉煌的成绩.

英语单词立体记忆 ... → shortly 简短地，简略地 → splendent 辉煌的，光彩的，显著的 → splendid 壮丽的，辉煌的.
splendens 耀光, splendent 发亮的, splendens 耀光的
splendent 发亮的, splendent 有光彩的, splendent 显著的

list.abs: securities business have passed the splendent decade ., 证券市场辉煌的十年.
solitary life-trip-maken , Lu Yao , in his short but splendent life , walking solitary and sturdy on the borderline territory of literary trend .路遥是一位孤独的旅人，在其短暂而辉煌的生命之旅中，他一直在文学潮流的边缘域孤立而倔强的行走；
all over fat merchant pace is on splendent rank brick , the businessman of catchpenny contact .浑身油腻的店主踱步在发亮的阶砖上,招徕着来往的商人。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Latin splendent- 'shining', from the verb splendere
